oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Depurification by Lorentz boosts
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kosinski, P.
Maslanka, P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Quantum Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We consider a particle of half-integer spin which is nonrelativistic in the rest frame. Assuming the particle is completely polarized along third axis we calculate the Bloch vector as seen by a moving observer. The result for its length is expressed in terms of dispersion of some vector operator linear in momentum. The relation with the localization properties is discussed.
